basics.name: José Miguel Mangas
basics.label: Python Developer and Data Analyst
basics.summary: Python Full Stack Developer with 1 year of experience in Python Development but many years in automation development, front-end design, back-end database management. Experience working for major companies such as Telefónica, Grupo Planeta, and Apple.

work.name: Python Developer and Data Analyst
work.summary: As a freelance Python Developer deeply engaged in diverse community projects, I not only sharpen my Python skills but also contribute actively to collaborative initiatives. My joy lies in supporting and sharing insights with fellow developers, fostering a culture of growth and knowledge-sharing. Engaging in these projects fuels my passion for learning and allows me to master various aspects of Python development. Currently, I'm also pursuing a professional certificate in IBM Data Science, delving into my initial data analysis projects.

work.name: Portrait Photographer
work.summary: I have been a freelance portrait photographer and business owner for 14 years. I have worked for brands such as Vogue Italia, Huda Beauty and the inditex Group in Europe and the United Arab Emirates.

work.name: GoShopia and Dubai Fashion News
work.summary: Dubai Fashion News is the number one online magazine about the Dubai and Middle East fashion industry, Goshopia is an e-commerce that sells sustainable luxury fashion around the world

work.name: K-tuin
work.summary: K-tuin SI is a company specialized in the sale and technical service of Apple products, offering a wide range of devices, accessories, and computer solutions for users and businesses.

work.name: Emergia - Jazztel
work.summary: Emergia is a leading company in technology customer service outsourcing. Within Emergia, I worked for Jazztel, one of the Top 4 Communications Companies nationwide in Spain.

work.name: Editorial Planeta Sistemas
work.summary: Planeta is the largest international Spanish-language publishing company and it is part of the AtresMedia conglomerate. Within Planeta Sistemas, the IT subdivision of the group, I implemented backup systems and spam review on the group's servers

work.name: PWC - Telefónica
work.summary: Telefónica is one of the largest technology companies in Spain and Latin America. While consulting for Telefónica through PWC, we developed a fault-finding system for both customer databases and Telefónica group websites (Escudo Project).
